item.title: Thanks For Paying Attention
item.description: This last week has brought some very nice and favorable attention to the Dead Programmer Society. The ever-popular “I’d Rather be A Jazz Programmer” post popped up again, this time in the stodgy old school publication Computerworld. They ran an article on the “Rock Star Programmer” meme, and decided that my little post was part of the “Kill Rock Stars” contrarian perspective they were looking for. Thanks for making me look so good, guys!
